title: Optimal facet assembly of multi-transition metal layered cathodes toward superior Li-ion kinetics and structural stability
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4319-4326
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00794H, Paper
Feng Zou, Jae-Bum Kim, Jiliang Zhang, Gi-Hyeok Lee, Lulu Lyu, Jun-Hyeok Choi, Timo Kankaanpää, Yong Min Lee, Yong-Mook Kang
The optimimal assembly of surface facets is one of the key microstructural descriptors to further enhance the electrochemical performances of layered cathode materials through the single particle strategy.
